attribute.name: suggestedItemsMethod
attribute.description: Reference to the method which returns the suggested items

attribute.name: maxSuggestedItems
attribute.description: optional attribute to identify the max size of suggested Values

attribute.name: delay
attribute.description: The AJAX Request is triggered after a given delay. In milliseconds.

attribute.name: startRequest
attribute.description: The AJAX Request is only triggered if the number of chars typed in is equal or greater than this given value.

attribute.name: popupStyle
attribute.description: Style for the window with a suggested list of items;pop up for each incoming Ajax response

attribute.name: popupStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the window with a suggested list of items;pop up for each incoming Ajax response

attribute.name: nextPageFieldClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the div field which steps to next page

attribute.name: columnHoverClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for a onmouseover event of the suggested columns

attribute.name: columnOutClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for a onmouseout event of the suggested columns

attribute.name: popupId
attribute.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute.name: listId
attribute.description: Id for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute.name: listStyle
attribute.description: Style for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute.name: listStyleClass
attribute.description: StyleClass for the unordered list included in the pop up window

attribute.name: listItemStyle
attribute.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute.name: listItemStyleClass
attribute.description: Id for the pop up window

attribute.name: var
attribute.description: Same principle as it is in dataTable. SuggestedItemsMethod returns a list of objects, where the variables can be accessed with the alias after the dot of the var.
